Posts.Content: Dec 6, 2016 07:47AM - edited Dec 10, 2016 08:21PM by Madelineg stage 4 denovo. Cancer was found in my hip first. I was on a transatlantic cruise and was taken off in France but Cancer was found by my orthopedic in TN. I am now walking with a cane after many months . I had surgery,then radiation and had started hormone therapy. I also get a shot for a bone strengther I do not feel sick at all.I am now on radiation on my breast after a mastectomy. I will not have reconstruction.
Posts.Title: How Many Are We? zarovka SimonH

Posts.Content: Madelineg wrote: He said I had cancer for 5 years untreated. After my husband passed, I saw something on my breast yet I let it pass. I just wanted my life back so I traveled all over Europe. It was on a trip in April that I suddenly could no longer walk. I was sent home with a nurse escort business class by my travel insurance company. A Orthopedic doctor found the cancer in my hip and said it had to come from somewhere. I told him about my breast. My oncologist contacted a surgeon and she did a biopsy. I a'm walking and driving now. I was in a wheelchair. Then a walker. I use a cane ,but I can walk without it.I am now undergoing radiation for my breast after a mastectomy. I do not feel sick. Nothing hurts and the only pain medication I take is Tylenol. My oncologist went on to say that I will live to be an old lady. I have not had any chemo but I will be taking a hormone therapy pill the rest of my life. Dx 5/25/2016, Left, 5cm, Stage IV, metastasized to bone, Grade 1, ER+, HER2- Surgery 12/3/2016 Mastectomy: Left Radiation Therapy 12/5/2016 Whole-breast: Breast Hormonal Therapy Aromasin (exemestane) Radiation Therapy External: Bone Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Jan 11, 2017 11:57PM Madelineg wrote: You have my Prayers. You know things can change in a instant and you could be stable again. Do not give up. I started with Stage 4 so I knew I was in for the long haul. I know someone that had stage ,4 melonima and it's ,13 years later and the meanie is still alive.He told a friend that I was going to die and I did just the opposite with him.
